title: Xbox Series S Confirmed? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.10.20
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about the success of Fall Guys along with the more leaks regarding Xbox Series S. 

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:00 - Housekeeping
Greg, Andy, Tim, and Kevin have an hour and a half long Avengers Let’s Play up on youtube.com/kindafunnygames!
We Have Cool Friends for today is already live on youtube.com/kindafunny and podcast services -- it features Steven Spawn, Kahlief Adams, Elyse Williams, and a conversation on how to be a better Ally in 2020.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
The Roper Report   -
00:07:20 - Fall Guys is a SMASH hit - Tom Phillips @ Eurogamer
00:19:30 - Xbox Series S has been confirmed in a leak - Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:22:20 - Do you think Xbox will just admit that it's real by tweeting out some announcement like they did with Halo Infinite MP being free-to-play? - Best Friends Q:greatmrlizard
00:25:20 - Are we closer to the Xbox launch than we think? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:29:38 - Microsoft has quietly dropped the Xbox 20/20 - Updateblog post
00:35:50 - AT&T might be changing its mind about selling WB Games - Vikki Blake @Eurogamer
00:38:10 - Marvel’s Avengers Seemingly has exclusive skins for Verizon and Intel Customers - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:40:30 - Is this the first time we are seeing this much of an exclusivity split between multiple companies and companies such Virgin Media who are an internet provider in the UK or have I just not noticed it before? - Best Friends Q:Thedeadman97
00:49:11 - Amazon renames Twitch Prime to Prime Gaming - Austen Goslin @ Polygon
00:47:00 -  QUIP
00:49:37 -  KLARNA
 Reader mail   -
00:50:50 - Do you think that third party exclusive content could be one way PlayStation may be trying to stall the industry move towards cross play? - A Qwerk of fate
00:54:45 - Squad Up:Alex(PS4) - D_UK_DEADMAN
00:56:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Imran
